fields.name: Gitika Sharma

responsibilities: Managed a team of 2 designers and led the end to end user experience of the Grocery category.
Led & designed regional shopping experiences for Grocery, contributing to 1.01% of Grocery GMV and achieving a 5% CTR.
Revamped Grocery category navigation, introducing sub-category pages resulting in a 2.3% GMV increase.
Designed the Flipkart Seller Platform category specific landing pages, increasing CTR by ~400% and seller registrations by ~300%.
Managed and designed 40+ thematic and festive stores for the Grocery category, contributing to ~2% of GMV.
Elevated the Camera category landing page experience, increasing page conversions by ~15%.
Contributed to the Design Language System for Flipkart Merch, ensuring a consistent user experience across 30+ category pages.
Managed design for the life@meesho media properties (Instagram, YouTube, LinkedIn).
Created storyboards & visuals for Meesho's YouTube content.
Achieved a 60% growth in Instagram followers within 4 months by revamping content design strategy.
Created designs for internal communications - onboarding kits, internal emailers, etc.
Headed design for the brand & managed video editing team to ensure consistent design across various channels.
Designed the UI/UX of Kraftshala's learning app, used by an active user base of 10K users.
Developed UI/UX for their website including 3+ course pages for 3 different cohorts.
Produced 100+ creatives for paid campaigns targeting different cohorts (working professionals & MBA students).
Handled social media planning & execution for 5+ clients which included cafes, media houses, salons, independent artists.
Designed online tools for InsideIIM & its two other properties - AltUni and InsideKampus.
Designed a college comparison tool generating 1000+ leads and engaging 2K+ users in 30 days from launch.
Revamped end to end UI/UX of Casio India's e-commerce website, improving user flows and customer journeys across product selection to checkout.

fields.name: Plabit Pattnaik

responsibilities: Vendor management and act as a single point of contact for them
Interact with the vendors to understand their sourcing and per-unit landing cost
Analysing the performance of vendors and providing recommendations reagrding the SKUs that need to be focused on depending on the season of the year.
Informing the vendor about the SKUs that other brands are providing in similar price range.
Negotiate with the OEM manufacturer regarding pricing, inventory and capacity enhancement based on demand
Run advertisements, coupons and other promotional campaigns on the portal to enhance products' visibility, which helps boost the company revenue.
Finding out gaps at category level across various price range
Taking margin call on various SKUs.
Negotiating with brands regarding pricing and inventory.
Coordinating with the cross-functional teams to remove bottlenecks and ensure sellers' payments are made as per the schedule
Team Lead: Responsible for driving sales, seller acquisition, selection expansion and account management for the team
Understand the bottlenecks faced by the team and provide solutions for the same
Strategise the roadmap for the team to meet their targets well in advance
Providing regular inputs to the team members to increase their productivity
Driving the Hygiene factor of the sellers for the entire north region
Building & Maintaining the Sales Dashboard for the team with Power BI
Account management of High-Value Sellers and act as a single point of contact for them
Interact with the sellers to understand their product's business model and per-unit costing
Analysing the performance of sellers and providing recommendations on the number of SKUs
Negotiate with the seller regarding pricing, inventory and capacity enhancement based on demand
Run advertisements, coupons and other promotional campaigns on sellers' accounts to enhance their products' visibility, which helps boost their revenues
Create a brand store for the sellers on the Amazon platform to increase customer stickiness
Persuade the sellers to participate in various Amazon events to boost their revenue
Coordinating with the cross-functional teams to remove bottlenecks and ensure sellers' payments are made as per the schedule
Upsell the existing BAU sellers to Prime sellers by communicating the benefits
Worked on pilot projects to acquire clients for Amazon Global in North American and European regions
achievements: Successfully convinced 10 sellers regarding capacity enhancement.
Upsell conversion ratio of more than 70 percent.
Converted 8 Lakhpati sellers into Crorepati sellers.

responsibilities: Managed SME clients of various industries with 50 to 250 Cr turnover
Forecasting financial models based on historical performances and management discussions
Interaction with promoters for a detailed understanding of the business from a credit appraisal perspective
Risk analysis and benchmarking of the client's business profile, including management evaluation
Preparation and presentation of the report to the sanctioning committee with initial recommendations
Collaborating with other channel teams, such as Trade Finance, Forex, Bill discounting etc., to offer the client workable solutions at competitive prices
achievements: Managed a portfolio of 250 crores across various industries
Successfully onboarded 10 clients to the ICICI ecosystem
Completed all the existing renewals on time

responsibilities: Check Graphical Arrangements (GA), Guaranteed Technical Particulars (GTP) as per Technical Specifications (TS) and prepared Monthly Project Reports
Acted as a single point of contact for all the stakeholders regarding project-related queries
Coordinating with all the stakeholders at regular intervals for the proper functioning of the project
Assess BAU activities of sites under my jurisdiction and recommend the erection bills to the clients
Inspect material dumped at various stores and recommend the supply bills to the clients
Managed 2 teams of 10+ members each
achievements: Reduced the approval time of GA, GTP & equipment drawings from an average time of 7 days to 3 days
Assisted in reducing the billing cycle period from 5 days to 2 days.
Assisted in limiting project cost escalation (Rs.128 Cr) to under 15% as required by the client
Aided in completing the IPDS project six months before the allocated period

fields.name: Anup kumar pal

expertise: Backend: SpringBoot, MicroServices, Hibernate, Maven, Kafka, MongoDB
Cloud & DevOps: GCP, AWS, AZURE, Jenkins, CI/CD, Kubernetes
Developer Tools: VS Code, Git/GitHub, Maven, IntelliJ, Postman
Other: Web API, REST API, Git, English, Hindi - Professional Proficiency

responsibilities: Contributed to creation of RESTful services using Spring Boot to integrate multiple data sources for real-time Customer-Engagement score evaluation and predictive analytics, significantly improving system scalability and efficiency.
Utilized Hibernate with Spring Data JPA to streamline database interactions and optimize data persistence.
Deployed Redis caching to optimize API performance in the real-time Customer -Engagement score, resulting in a remarkable 87% reduction in latency and significantly decreased response time.
Implemented pagination and sorting functionalities within API endpoints, enhancing efficiency and user experience by 67%.
Developed a modular and scalable Restful API using Java, Spring Boot, and Microservices architecture, ensuring seamless integration, maintainability, and performance optimization.

Implemented a MongoDB query executor using Kafka and Redis, effectively caching query executor events to streamline query execution processes and significantly reducing manual query execution by 80%, showcasing enhanced efficiency and automation in data retrieval workflows.
Integrated Prometheus and Grafana for Kubernetes monitoring, integrated with PagerDuty alerts, achieving a 90% decrease in outage likelihood in the production environment.

Demonstrated expertise in managing large-scale data migration, achieving a 99.9% data integrity rate and ensuring seamless transitions for 500+ users, reducing downtime by 60% and completing the migration project 20% under budget.
Utilized Azure services like Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) for container orchestration, ensuring seamless deployment and scaling of Microservices.

Implemented Rest Controller within Spring framework to develop highly efficient RESTful Web services for communication. Used Postman to test the RESTful API for HTTP requests such as GET, POST, and PUT.

Ensured robust security measures through expert implementation of authentication and authorization mechanisms like OAuth 2.0 and JSON Web Tokens (JWT), contributing to enhanced data protection and user privacy.
Used Rest Controller in Spring framework to create RESTful Web services and JSON objects for communication.

Monitored the performance of assisted entities and followed up on delayed payments.

Coordinated with auditors, advocates, and compliance officers to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements, including timely submissions of RBI, ROC, TDS, and GST returns.
Interacted & collaborated with various business houses and promoters to comprehend their fund requirements.
Created Information Memorandum / Proposal Notes for funding, involving project cost breakdowns, projected financial statements, loan repayment schedules.
Coordinated with bankers, valuers, and advocates to address all queries related to the loan proposal.
Ensured completion of loan documentation with bankers post sanction, and organized the filing of charge creation forms with the Registrar of Companies (ROC).

responsibilities: Responsible for the product movement from plant via warehouses to meet the demand by effectively managing all resources.

Assessing overall supply chain from factory to consumer focusing on regional and country logistics network infrastructure to design innovative solutions, reducing operational costs and improving delivery times while maintaining high service levels
Maintaining optimum inventory levels by engaging in S & OP planning and giving right demand to plant logistics team
Responsible for the entire secondary logistics cost management and cost reduction for assigned business area.
Managing and controlling admin, service, handling, freight, rent cost, demurrage and wharf cost.
Ensuring the adherence of service by transporters and C&Fs as per defined SOP
Ensuring optimum routes for secondary deliveries from warehouses and insuring right costing model for same
Managing and optimizing the entire network of warehouses and ensuring the optimum utilization to meet the demand including feasibility assessment of new warehouse opening
Maintain optimum inventory levels by engaging in S & OP planning and giving right demand to plant logistics team
Develop relationship with key vendors and manage transport association issues
Key Vendor account management by Verifying and passing the vendors and transporters claims/bills and provide the inputs to finance on same
Timely and appropriate training to C&Fs on best practices in logistics and warehouse management
Control on product damages and disposal of same as per SOP.
Implementing best in class logistics and warehouse management process and practices in line with corporate logistics
Directing and coordinating all functional personnel to continually achieve a high degree of professional performance
Developing key performance indicators to monitor office and warehouse personnel performance in terms of safety, quality and productivity
achievements: Leading team of 2 members and 24 Warehouse Managers
Managing volume of 90000 to 100000 MT per month with value of 70 to 80 crores
Maintaining successful relationship with 29 vendors
Reduced TDC by Rs. 150/MT in in short lead distance

workExperience.position: Deputy Manager Supply chain (South & West SCM Operations)
responsibilities: Supervised Supply planning and distribution planning by effectively managing the distribution centers (DCs) by close coordination with CFA and 3PL partners.

Lead process improvement projects and ensured process compliance in DCs by doing - Damages reduction by root cause analysis and implemented right action plans, Improved dispatch accuracy and delivery lead time and tracking of same by MIS and dashboards., Develop MIS/ Dashboards to mitigate Damage/Leakage/Expiry/Non-moving inventory, Implementation and stabilization of warehouse management system and finding improvement opportunity, Implemented FEFO logic, Indenting module, Batch management, Pallet management, right layout, Improved warehouse productivity and performance by regular monthly review., Ensured Timely physical verification of stocks in DCs.
Lead annual planning activity of DCs by doing overhead planning and Capex planning also ensured the execution of same.
Effectively managed 3PLs partners and reduce the transportation cost by implementing right models of transportations, also controlled the cost of transport on daily basis.
Improved safety standards of DCs by taking suitable safety initiative like conducting training, implementing safety SOP, and timely review of safety management.
Negotiated with DC vendors like CFA, landlords and finalize the contract agreements on time.
Ensured timely completion of forecasting of all product categories within deadline, also giving training and guidance to sales team for improving forecast accuracy.
Identifying the supply gaps and replenishment of same by coordinating with central procurement team.
Reduction of the expiry material by enhancing optimum inventory level at stores and warehouses by close coordination with the sales team.
Maintaining optimum inventory level at warehouses by doing required warehouse to warehouse, forward and reverse movement of stocks.
achievements: Fully reshaped supply chain strategy resulting in an improvement of the service provided to customers (Fill Rate) from 80% to 91% in a very strong growth environment while drastically reducing total costs by 26% and inventory by 12%
Decreased lead-time by >50% with innovative transportation solutions; attained best-in class product transit times through the acquisition and integration of best Solutions

Centralized the inventory team working across several retails' brands; managing stock allocation and daily replenishment to 310 stores to deliver sales and promotional plans ensuring inventory availability

projects.name: Supply Chain Network Optimization
projects.objective: To form the right routes that can strengthen the distribution network to optimize primary and secondary lanes, both forward & reverse logistics. To improve lead-time and delivery fill rate. To reduce and control the leakages, Damages, and expiry.
projects.impact: Improved distribution network by establishing 3 new warehouses.

projects.name: Developing and Implementing Demand forecast model
projects.objective: Study of different forecast models and evaluating the forecast errors. Successfully implemented the seasonal forecasting model with high accuracy.
projects.impact: Reduced the forecast errors by 35% across business.

projects.name: Transportation Cost Optimization and Implementation of Right Model of Transportation
projects.objective: Evaluation of different transportation models with objective cost reduction.
projects.impact: Successfully implemented the dedicated vehicle (Milk run) delivery model. Achieved targets by reducing 29% cost on transportation across the business.

projects.name: Implementation of the QR code system for Improving Warehousing Management
projects.objective: Implemented the QR code system in warehouses to improve warehousing management by adopting FEFO logic for dispatches
projects.impact: Improved the tracking and tracing of the inventory to reduce the expiry.

fields.Raw_text_resume: AWS/ AZURE -DevOps Engineer /SRE Lingala Praveen Mobile No - (+91) 9346529823 E-mail – lpraveen023@gmail.com Professional Summary: DevOps Engineer (SRE) • Having 5.6 years of experience in IT industry. Currently I am working on Azure, AWS, DevOps, Configuration Management, Build Management, Requirement Management and Change Management by using licensed & other open -source tools. On the server side I am working on Windows, L inux, AIX and Solaris OS. • Developed and implemented CI/CD pipelines to automate the build, test, and deployment processes for multiple projects. • Upgrading Jenkins version frequently based on client requirement without affecting the ongoing Live projects an d Jenkins Jobs. • Created the Shared libs for collection of independent Groovy scripts that we can access when running Pipeline. • Server maintenance and upgrades of Linux and Windows for Jenkins. • Maintain Openshift pods, and cluster orchestration for Auto scaling, Healing, Auto rollback. • Actively involved in various phases of project for requirement gathering, Planning, Design, Implementation and Delivery to client on time. • Responsible for maintaining 99.99% uptime of infrastructure/services. • Actively inv olved in calls with client for requirement gathering, Planning, Changes in infrastructure. GIT source control. • Infrastructure development on AWS using various services like EC2, VPC, S3, Load Balancer, Cloud watch for monitoring and IAM. • Taking responsible of P1, P2 blockers, Debugging and finding • Configured and maintained Jenkins to implement the CI and CD the root cause and making the documents on the same. • Integration between different Automation tools with Cloud. • Production deployment from build to stage and production based on the featur e changes from Developers. • Azure SPN key rotations before it expires every 3 months or year. • Utilized cloud technologies such as AWS, Azure to set up scalable and cost -effective infrastructure for development and production environments. • Worked with deve lopment teams to identify and implement new tools and processes to improve efficiency and productivity. • Managed infrastructure as code using tools such as Terraform or Ansible to ensure consistency and repeatability in the deployment process. • Monitored sys tem performance and proactively addressed issues to ensure high availability and reliability of the infrastructure. • Designed and implemented end -to-end CI/CD pipelines to automate the build, test, and deployment processes for multiple projects. • Conducted regular security assessments and implemented measures to ensure the safety of systems against security threats. • Collaborated with development and security teams to identify and address potential vulnerabilities in the CI/CD pipeline. • Monitored sy stem logs and alerts to proactively detect and respond to security incidents. • Stayed up -to-date with the latest security trends and best practices to continuously improve the security posture of the CI/CD pipeline. • Experience of Implementing Dev Ops by inte grating source control tools GIT, build tools like Maven, CI/CD tool like Azure DevOps, Jenkins and Deployment automation tool like Ansible practices for the Billing Development Teams using Subversion, SonarQube, TOMCAT. • Experience and in -depth Knowledge o f understanding in the strategy and practical implementation of AWS Cloud -Specific technologies including EC2, EBS, S3, VPC, IAM • Good experience and administrate on continues integration tool like Jenkins. • Created automated build and release environment us ing Continuous Integration Tools • Jenkins. • Implement Master -Slave concept in Jenkins. • Experience in configuring and deploying Web Applications using TOMCAT. • Migration of existing systems to AWS and using the snapshot method for the EBS volumes. • Configured Continuous Integration (CI) tools Jenkins from scratch. Managed Jenkins Plugins, created slave nodes, created build and deployment jobs, handled administration, backup, and migration activities. • Handled operations and maintenance support for AWS cloud resources which includes launching, maintaining and troubleshooting EC2 instances, S3 buckets, Virtual Private Clouds (VPC), Elastic Load Balancers (ELB) and Relational Database Services (RDS). • Created and updated Ansible playbooks. • Configured Ansib le to manage AWS environments and automate the build process for core AMIs used by all application deployments including Auto scaling, and Cloud formation scripts. • Amazon IAM was used to maintain the user credentials and involved in creating custom IAM policies to various groups defined within the organization. • Design high availability applications on AWS across availability zones and availability regions. • Have good experience on CloudFormation . • Created AWS Security Groups for deploying and configuring AWS EC2 instances. • Experience in configuring and deploying Web Applications using TOMCAT. • Having good knowledge in Dockers, Docker file • Configuring the Docker containers and creating docker files for different environments. • Configured and maintained Jenkins to implement the CI process and integrated the tool with Maven to schedule the builds and automated the deployment on the application servers using the “code deploy” plug -in for Jenkins. Helm : - • Application Deployment: Helm simplifies deploying complex applications by packaging all required resources into a single chart. This makes application deployment more consistent and repeatable. • Templating: Helm uses templates to generate Kubernetes manifests. Templates allow parameterization and customiza tion, making it simpler to manage configuration variations for different environments. • Versioning and Rollbacks: Helm keeps track of releases, enabling you to upgrade, rollback, or revert to specific versions of applications easily. • Reusability: Helm chart s can be shared, reused, and extended, improving collaboration and efficiency in Kubernetes -based projects. • Configuration Management: With Helm's values and templates, you can manage configuration files separately from the chart, enhancing configurability and maintainability. • Centralized Management: Helm charts centralize configurations, making it easier to manage applications and services across different Kubernetes clusters. • Infrastructure as Code: Helm charts can be versioned, stored in repositories, and treated as code, which aligns well with the DevOps practice of treating infrastructure as code. Educational Details: • SSC - Seven Hills High School • Intermediate - Sri Chaitanya junior Collage • Bachelor of Computer Science - SRM University Professional Experience: • Working as Senior Software Professional in Techbeez Software Technologies private limited Bengaluru from April , 2018 to May , 2021 • Currently working with Infogain India PVT LTD in Bengaluru, May 2021 to May 2022 • Currently working with Sapiens in Bengaluru, May 202 2 to Present Address : Kave rappa Layout, Kadubeesanahalli, Kadabeesanahalli, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560103 Technical Skills: Version Control Tools Git, Git Hub Build Tools Maven Continuous Integration Jenkins , Containerization Docker, Kubernetes Configuration Management Ansible Scripting Languages Python, Shell Script , Operating System Linux, Windows Cloud Technologies AWS, Azure Application Servers Tomcat, JBOSS Database Oracle, MySql , MongoDB, Postgresql Ticketing Tools Jira and Snow Third party tools EFK, Keycloak and ArgoCD and KeyVault Work Experience: Sapiens Projects: Currently I’m working on below projects. Hiscox, ABSA, LFK, GPF, HGS and CNPSI. We have three products to deliver the clients - IDIT, Core suite and Digital. Hiscox, HGS and ABSA – IDT products. LKF, ABSA, GPF and CNPSI – Core suite and Digital . fields.name: Barnendu Sarkar

responsibilities: Received the award of 'Fanatic Leader' in Q2, 2022 for launching 13+ categories for 'Relevel by Unacademy' in 6.5 months. Average NPS of launched categories stands at 72% with an ARR of INR 100 Cr

Bagged 'Relevel Ace' award in Q1, 2022 for scaling the educator pool by 6x in less than 60 days, to ensure two cohort launches per month for the tech categories - Backend, Frontend, Fullstack & Testing

Acquired educators at commercials at least 50% lesser than that of immediate competitors to ensure healthy cohort-level unit economics. Despite of the cost control, average educator rating stands at 4.2/5 as on Aug '22

Launched Competitive Programming (CP) category as part of the Test Prep business of Unacademy, scaling it from a monthly revenue of INR 5 L to INR 1.2 Cr. in <6 months, before it merged with 'Relevel by Unacademy'

Spearheaded the monetization of the Code Chef platform through activating the user base via Banner Ads, CRM targeting: Push, Email Marketing, WhatsApp/ SMS, free coding events and YouTube-driven content sales. Result: top of the funnel growth by 90%, amounting to ~11000 additional leads (at source) per month
Ensured that cost per lead is reduced to INR 44 (approx.) while optimizing gross margin of the offering to ~62%
Revamped the traditional inside sales process and set up CRM automations that helped in achieving a monthly IST revenue of INR 82 L with only 19 BDEs and 2 Sales Managers for the CP category

Responsible for driving Direct Channel (App) growth - Revamped pricing strategy and built CRM centric growth models that increased app originated hotel occupancy rate in USA from 3.8% to 5.9% in less than two months
Increased RevPAR by 30% in USA through sequential deployment of comprehensive web data integration solutions that enabled dynamic control of prices with respect to OTA competitors like BDC/ Expedia

Ran multiple pilots - TikTok Ads, GMB Optimization, ATL/ BTL activations, Chatbots, etc. aimed at growing the traction of Call Center channel in Latin America. Outcome - sales call volume increased by 42%

Optimized the call-center business of OYO Latin America thereby reducing monthly expenditure by 35% through effective manpower planning, live agent dashboards, cognitive load balancing & segmented call routing

On-boarded 55+ new logos as strategic business partners and designed synergies of mutual growth thereby increasing GMV contribution of Non-Commission Alliance channel by 9.5x from April 19' to November '19
Developed and scaled affiliate driven sales channel of Cloud Pharmacy from zero to one, across 8 cities in India (Monthly GMV Contribution: INR 8.5 Cr. and LTV to CAC Ratio - 6:1 as of November 2019)

Conducted rigorous data analysis to develop/ launch subscription based products (Medical Cards, Diabetes Care Plan) aimed at promoting 1mg's core vision of patient centered care delivery while reducing CAC by 20%
Designed and implemented process flows to migrate key account management and incident resolution from WhatsApp groups to Salesforce thereby reducing order processing TAT by 58%
Designed and executed omnichannel growth strategies for scaling private label products to offline customers
Formulated channel partner reward strategy for providing last mile support & reduced delivery costs by 18%
Achieved 14% NCVI (Net Contract Value Increase) for calendar year 2018, through effective up-selling and cross selling of Gartner offerings to Healthcare Payer accounts in Asia Pacific region
Partnered with CIOs/ CTOs of Healthcare Payers in Asia Pacific region to understand their mission critical priorities. Built custom engagement roadmaps to demonstrate Gartner value & ensure retention
Devised segment specific GTM strategy for a $6 million fintech start-up and provided guidance to CTO/ CDO in identifying strategic technology partners to implement the same

Identified and realized pertinent cost savings of $20 million for a brokerage service provider through setting up SOPs for strategically managing financial, licensing and contractual aspects of IT assets
Ideated, conceived and built NLP-driven automation products / toolkits which boosted process excellence through reducing turnaround time for account level secondary research by 84%

Identified industry-wise technology priorities of 2018 through primary and secondary research, thereby helping Marketing team to achieve cost savings of $70000 in finalizing themes for brand communications
Introduced new functionalities and features to Service Delivery team's Knowledge Management platform for automated creation of engagement models, thereby widening Client Servicing bandwidth by 40%
Anchored bids worth total contract value of $15 million with program management and solution integration support achieving a win ratio of 52% (1.3x of the team average)

Converted leads (Healthcare & Insurance domain) generated by onsite business development team into prospects with potential business value of $12 million. Anchored ODC/ site visits of converted prospects
Developed project management frameworks and customized task planning tools thereby enabling clear dissemination of ownership responsibilities and reduction of bid turnaround time by 35%
Conceptualized & evaluated key sales driven metrics to analyze horizontal-wise bid management performance. The monthly analysis was reported to CEO & Global Delivery Head to drive sales execution

Assisted branch managers in driving sales and achieving retail business targets

Initiation of customer transaction through CBS without delay and minimal TAT and zero error
Achieving the given target for up selling and Gross selling
Management of cash position of branch and disposal of excess cash to avoid revenue leakage

Development of Thin Client product for Banking and Railway sector

responsibilities: Responsible for Leading Retail expansion for group -Direct Management of one city/Territory
Achieved no. of store openings in the markets identified as per the business plan
Conducting financial analysis and technical feasibility of the site
Coordinating with finance team for analyzing and calculating profitability sheet and ROI aspect for Decision making process
Streamlining and formulatig robust legal agreement for new stores with aim to ensure statutory adherence and mitigate organizational risk exposure
Maintaining strong relationships with existing and prospective landlords
Working with IPC, Consultants etc - Formulated Strategic Plans to expand network across the assigned territory in line with Company strategy.
Responsible for Business expansion (property/Land acquisition leasing) across Karnataka, Tamil Nadu, Telangana, Andhra Pradesh, Pondicherry and Kerala
Leading a team of 4 executives to drive the acquisition and real estate support in 6 states
Successfully rolled out 104 retail stores through team members and 36 stores by self and 3 Office spaces.
Successfully acquired Land in 7 different locations for car sales outlets, showrooms and Car Parking spaces in Malls.
Controlled the rental outflow of 30% after Re-negotiations with LLs and stake holders.
Responsible for Business expansion (property acquisition/leasing) Karnataka
Responsible for site identification, catchment analysis, market mapping, commercial negotiations, property feasibility report, re-negotiations etc
Co-ordination with legal, project and operation team respectively.
Responsible for due diligence and legal/contract management.
Relationship management with LLs, consultants, investors, IPC etc.
Responsible for expansion in different formats like COCO, COFO, FOFO etc
Successfully rolled out 2 Stores in the span of 3 months.

Campus placed to Bata India Ltd, started working as a Store Manager in the retail industry. Skilled in Management, Retail, Inventory Management, Visual Merchandising, and Retail Sales, Later on Promoted to Cluster manager where I was handling E-Commerce business of 7 stores

Later on Shifted to Property acquisition team after a period of time where I was handling Renegotiating and Finalizing the rent, Rental Negotiation, Downsizing the rental outflow, Maintaining the relationship with Landlords.
Planning and Signing long stay residential real estate through local sources (builders, agents, brokers and house owners)
Working closely with Area Supply Managers/Heads and targeting cluster for short, medium and long term supply
Coordinating with transformation and operations team to ensure that the property stays active as a profitable business unit
Managing relations with property owners, negotiating and renegotiating as per business requirements.
Responsible for driving & achieving the performance metrics of warehouse operations and sales.
Daily & weekly resource planning (Manpower, vehicles etc.) based on planned loads
Collaborate with operations, procurement and other stake holders to enhance customer base coverage and market presence in the city
Daily analysis of sales targets and operational metrics and creating actionable aimed towards continuous improvement
Responsible for driving Channel Partners (Logistics & Delivery partners) setup in the assigned geography as per the company guidelines.
Responsible for managing the warehouse operations viz. Inventory performance in the warehouse
Controlling damage
Stock reconciliation at warehouse.

responsibilities: Litigation management for Debt Recovery (Sec. 138 cases, Arbitration proceedings, Civil cases, Criminal matters, Execution of Awards, interaction with law enforcement agencies etc.).
Driving a team of recovery professionals and agencies.

Effectively undertaken Legal action in recoveries, collections such as legal cases U/s 138, arbitration, FIR, civil Suits such as injunctions, recovery by simple and summery procedure /speeder trial (U/O 37).

Preparing summary of cases for discussion with lawyers and drafting legal pleadings for vetting senior lawyers. An effective communicator and team leader with proven team building and management abilities.
Take care of risk in collections activities and monitor the collection of amounts due to the organization and manage the day-to-day activities of the legal Collections/legal Recovery Team.
Co-ordination with Police and legal bodies for collection of Bad debts from Defaulters and executions.
Appearing before various Courts, Tribunals, Commissions, Securities Appellate Tribunals and Regulatory Authorities, Managed inhouse litigation and recovery.

Preparing & drafting claims for arbitration, handling the proceeding for and on behalf of the company; drafting & vetting writ petitions, case papers and appeals for submissions / pleadings for legal proceedings.

responsibilities: Managing delinquent account recovery and establishing terms of payment as well as handling vendor management, Portfolio management & Monitoring for strategies purpose.

Enhancing role of Strategy, Implementation & Monitoring, and digitization of litigation.

responsibilities: Management of Unsecured assets, SME, Digital Lending, Merchant Receivable Finance, Health Care Equipment finance cases litigation.

RBI & Compliance Reporting, legal process review and strategy implementation, bucket wise and product wise.
Arbitration cases management.
Training to the legal team and collections team across functions, cross functionals training sessions, implementation of legal strategies etc.

workExperience.position: AVP & National Legal Manager – Secured & Unsecured Assets, Consumer Bank
responsibilities: Supervised the In-house legal team of 50+ legal professionals across India for all Unsecured Assets and Secured Assets (Kotak Credit Card, Personal Loan, Business Loan, Loan Against Securities, Housing Finance, Loan Against Property, Working Capital) of the Bank to enhance the recovery of dues from the delinquent customers through cost effective legal intervention.

Drafting and vetting of Police complaint in various fraud matters pertains to Kotak Credit Card, Salaried Personal Loan. Drafting and vetting the reply of complaint received from Banking Ombudsperson and coordinating with the Bank Nodal Officer for timely response.
Filing Police complaint in various fraud matter pertains to high value cases of Housing loan and Loan against Property. Providing support to Legal Team of Housing Loan and LAP.
Defending the organization in against matters, coordinating with the location advocates to action in against cases.
Managing Arbitration for all unsecured assets successfully and appeared in contested matters. Providing the Arbitral Awards to different locations for filing execution.
All 1 Cr+ Cases reviews and focused legal approach for resolution.
Team management, including the Central Legal Team. Set many legal process and compliances for unsecured assets and Secured assets during stint with Kotak.
Maintained cordial relationship with all NCMs of Flows/Recoveries and Secured assets segments.

fields.Raw_text_resume: Page 1 of 7 SUMANTA KUMAR SAHOO, MBA (F), MARD, MCOM (Mkt. Mgt) India │ +91 -94395 86389 │ Skype – Sumanta.sahoo9 sumantasahoo23@yahoo.com │sumantsks@gmail.com _____________________________________________________________________________________________ With 1 5 years of professional experience in project execution across various Asian countries and international organizations, I have successfully managed and implemented several major rural, urban, and development initiatives for government, non -government, bilat eral, and multilateral donors. My expertise extends to working directly with reputable organizations such as UNDP, UNFAO, KPMG, BBC, CGIAR -CIP, CRISIL, PRADAN, Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs, Government of India (MoHUA), Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare, Government of India (MoAFW), and Ministry of Water Resources, River Development and Ganga Rejuvenation, Government of India (MoWR, RD & GR). I take pride in my ability to deliver exceptional results and meet project objectives while mainta ining a high level of professionalism. Achievements: • Designed risk mitigation pools for socio -economic crises in India. • Reviewed sustainable finance options including blue and green bonds. • Developed central government mitigation mechanisms based on FC-XV recommendations. • Formulated funding modules for greenfield projects under PPP frameworks. • Acquired funding from GIZ, RKVY, and MoAFW for various developmental projects. • Implemented SDSS and Online MIS for FAO's global GEF projects. • Authored policy on water utility finance and contributed to the JJM Scheme. • Established UNDP project office and developed DPRs for sanitation initiatives. • Conducted financial studies and surveys for financial inclusion in South Asia and Africa. • Created AWP, SAAP, and budget frameworks for projects in multiple countries. • Developed a poll fund mechanism and facilitated a World Bank soft loan for MoA&FW. • Drafted fiduciary documents for World Bank loans and built capacity for DoA&FW stakeholders. • Designed MIS reporting frameworks for central ministries. • Issued municipal bonds and implemented VCF and VGF for urban projects. • Integrated women SHGs into development projects and build capacity for various groups. • Coordinated financial inclusion efforts with rural banks and distributed POS machines. • Developed business models for Urban Renewal Missions and trained municipal officers. • Established financial inclusion strategies for women SHGs in Odisha. • Led Micro -Hydro projects in remote villages and constructed eco -friendly sanitation facilities. • Formed VDCs and VLFASCs to oversee program expenses and implementation. • Partnered with NGOs for convergence projects in tribal -dominated districts of Odisha. • Worked with government schemes like JJM, PMFBY, KCC, PM -KISAN, and others. EDUCATION ▪ MBA (Finance) from Pondicherry University, Puducherry, India 2015 ▪ Master of Commerce (Marketing) Utkal University, Odisha, India 2008 ▪ Master of Rural Management , IGNOU, New Delhi. India 2020 ▪ Bachelor of Commerce (H) ( BCOM ) from Utkal University, Bhubaneswar, India 2005 CERTIFICATE/COURSES ▪ Climate Finance: “Innovative Approaches in Supporting Climate Action”, 2021, World Bank ▪ Conflict of Interest Risk Management of Your Project” May 19, 2021 , World Bank ▪ PMP Project Management Professional, May 24, 2021 , LinkedIn/KPMG ▪ Procurement Authority at FAO, Oct 2021 UN - FAO ▪ Water utility financing, June 2021 World bank ▪ The GEF result Framework, Oct 2021 World Bank ▪ Disaster Risk Finance, December 2022 World Bank PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE Organization Designation Period UNDP National Program Manager Dec 2022 till date… Program Management Expertise: Page 2 of 7 • Developed and managed an insurance risk pool mechanism for NDMA, including feasibility studies, stakeholder engagement, and technical proposals for parametric insurance against natural disasters. • Analyzed and supported the implementation of FC -XV recommendations across government ministries, focusing on disaster risk management and climate change adaptation strategies. Strategic Collaboration: • Collaborated with regulators and ministries to design an inclusive insurance product covering health, life, accident, property, crop, and livestock risks for low -income households, with a focus on affordability and simplicity. • Engaged with international bodies like MoAFW, ADB, WB, and MOEFCC to implement projects related to insurance and risk finance, including the Global Index Insurance Facility and the InsuResilience Global Partnership. Innovative Financial Solutions: • Partnered with IRDAI, SEBI, and institutions of national importance to develop tools for risk finance, such as a catastrophe risk model, catastrophe bonds, a parametric trigger platform, and a blockchain -based transaction platform. Sustainable Finance Initiatives: • Implemented a sustainable finance mechanism targeting marginalized indigenous societies, enhancing their livelihoods and well -being while preserving cultural and environmental integrity. • Supported the Indian government's involvement in the Integrated National Financing Framework (INFF), aligning financing strategies with national development priorities and the SDGs. Climate Finance Leadership: • Oversaw SDG finance initiatives and G20 activities related to climate finance, including the SDG Investor Map and the SDG Finance Facility. • Developed proposals for UNDP India to secure climate finance from sources like the Green Climate Fund, Global Environment Facility, Adaptation Fund, Climate Investment Funds, and the NAMA Facility. Organization Designation Period UN – FAO (MoAFW) Dy. Team Lead (Coordination, M&E & Budget) Aug 2021 to Nov 2022 The GEF6 project will work on Biological Diversity, Climate Change, Persistent Organic Pollutants, Combat Desertification, and Mercury in five states (landscapes). Co -leader of a national team responsible for executing GEF6 goals in five landscapes: OD, MZ , MP, RJ, and UK. fields.Raw_text_resume: Goal-driven, focused & strategic professional offering 20.8 years of experience in R&D Product Engineering, Process Engineering, Quality Implementation, Cost Optimization and Production Machining Proven capabilities in R&D Product Engineering by implementing cost-saving measures to achieve operational excellence; experience in managing activities involving report generation, product inspection, resource planning, in-process control, audits, team building, and coordination with internal departments. Wealth of expertise in developing new process concepts for production optimization, yield improvement and preparing guidelines for sequencing of manufacturing activities in the organization Proficient in entire lifecycle of process engineering from Supplier schedule follow up, DAP, Pre dispatch inspection, Installation and commissioning, Machine prove out to handover of the machines to production. Strong knowledge of Transmission Assembling Parts including MT, AMT, Electrical Vehicle–Reducer Transmission and Transmission Troubleshooting & Analysis Drawing study & manufacturing feasibility study of new product/process to adhere to existing processes of the company & preparation of risk analysis report. Front-led major role in implementing continuous process improvement initiatives involving modification activities & quality initiatives to enhance the overall operational efficiency. fields.name: Dr.Sunaina Singh

responsibilities: Drive efficiency and improvements in business processes across the group to maximize value, potential and capacity using data driven strategy and principles of lean six sigma and agile.
Simplify business processes while achieving challenging targets, to deliver successful productivity, cost reduction, and elevated customer experience.
Translate business requirements into digitization needs and deliver on complex digitization efforts through effective collaboration and planning and monitoring.
Leverage data for analytics, planning and forecasting, performance management and support proactive performance management through monitoring of KPIs.
Actively involved in strategic initiatives around value realization, CX and growth-related projects from design to execution, being a part of the corporate office team.

Deliver sustainable cultural and behavioral changes across the business to build an Operational Excellence and Continuous Improvement culture including support functions, through coaching, mentoring, and influencing employees, and business team leaders.

Develop value proposition for growth strategy and process optimization projects across healthcare spectrum including large medical device and pharma companies and worked on provider and payer sides across Southeast Asia.
Extensive experience in business transformation, operational and commercial excellence, supply chain management, and performance measurement and improvement.
Conducted research-based studies and report outs spanning across regulations, market entry strategies, competitive intelligence.
Strategic work for new business lines like homecare, eldercare, retirement homes, new products launch.
Account management and project management for projects across region, managing diverse and large cross functional teams to deliver onto client expectations.
Large scale transformation projects in both public and private sectors, focusing on improving system and resource efficiencies and customer experience.
Market opportunity assessment, feasibility studies for products and service lines, due diligence for M&As.
Worked with the corporate houses of healthcare companies to create long term strategy based on CI, market research and best practices.
Collaborated with large government organizations for organizing healthcare events and exhibitions.
Led the excellence awards for healthcare practice across all verticals.
Conceptualized, setup and managed the homecare and eldercare vertical including budgeting, marketing, and customer experience.
Nurtured strategic partnerships to enable the ecosystem and provide holistic care at home.
Adopted best practice of care from the flagship hospital to translate into clinical excellence through quality initiatives, training, and monitoring programs.
Managed a large team of care providers and administrative staff to ensure high quality homecare.

Part of the corporate strategy team for this tertiary care hospital chain, instrumental in driving impactful data driven projects spanning across operational and process excellence, cost optimization and customer experience.
Developed and automated Hospital MIS and built dashboards to track hospital quality and operational key performance indicators.

Head of patient safety and part of the core JCI team for hospital accreditation responsible for creating policies and systems to ensure highest quality care. Created training programs and audit systems to ensure compliance to the systems.
Integral part of project launch team of a successful 1500 bed hospital, instrumental in planning, policy development, IT process blueprinting and operationalization of clinical units.
Set-up and managed operations for diagnostics and clinical units.
Drove automation of patient clinical information to standardize care records and enhance patient care as IT super user.
Employee insurance and health care management

Masters in Hospital and Health Administration
